# HEAPSIZE
[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

公開與 [\/HEAP](../../build/reference/heap-set-heap-size.md) 連結器選項相同的功能。  
  
```  
/HEAP:reserve[,commit]  
```
